verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <WH1984> Hal-lu Praise יָ֨הּ׀ <WH3050> yah ye the LORD הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> hal-lu- Praise אֵ֥ל <WH410> 'el God בְּקָדְשׁ֑וֹ <WH6944> be-ka-de-Sho; in his sanctuary הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <WH1984> hal-Lu-hu, praise בִּרְקִ֥יעַ <WH7549> bir-Ki-a' him in the firmament עֻזּֽוֹ׃ <WH5797> uz-Zo. of his power

הַֽלְל֥וּהוּ <WH1984> hal-Lu-hu Praise בִגְבוּרֹתָ֑יו <WH1369> vig-vu-ro-Tav; him for his mighty acts הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <WH1984> hal-Lu-hu, praise כְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> ke-Ro him according to his excellent גֻּדְלֽוֹ׃ <WH1433> gud-Lo. greatness

הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ <WH1984> Hal-lu-hu Praise בְּתֵ֣קַע <WH8629> be-Te-ka' him with the sound שׁוֹפָ֑ר <WH7782> sho-Far; of the trumpet הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <WH1984> hal-Lu-hu, praise בְּנֵ֣בֶל <WH5035> be-Ne-vel him with the psaltery וְכִנּֽוֹר׃ <WH3658> ve-chin-Nor. and harp

הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ <WH1984> Hal-lu-hu Praise בְתֹ֣ף <WH8596> ve-Tof him with the timbrel וּמָח֑וֹל <WH4234> u-ma-Chol; and dance הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <WH1984> hal-Lu-hu, praise בְּמִנִּ֥ים <WH4482> be-min-Nim him with stringed instruments וְעוּגָֽב׃ <WH5748> ve-'u-Gav. and organs

הַֽלְל֥וּהוּ <WH1984> hal-Lu-hu Praise בְצִלְצְלֵי־ <WH6767> ve-tzil-tze-lei- cymbals שָׁ֑מַע <WH8088> Sha-ma'; him upon the loud הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <WH1984> hal-Lu-hu, praise בְּֽצִלְצְלֵ֥י <WH6767> be-tzil-tze-Lei cymbals תְרוּעָֽה׃ <WH8643> te-ru-'Ah. him upon the high sounding

כֹּ֣ל <WH3605> kol everything הַ֭נְּשָׁמָה <WH5397> Han-ne-sha-mah Let every thing that hath breath תְּהַלֵּ֥ל <WH1984> te-hal-Lel praise יָ֗הּ <WH3050> Yah, the LORD הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> hal-lu- Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> Yah. ye the LORD
